CustomField.description: Field only to be displayed for Community users.
CustomField.formula: IF( Tier_1__c , "Tier 1" & BR(),"") & IF( Tier_2__c , "Tier 2" & BR(),"") & IF( Tier_3__c , "Tier 3" & BR(),"") & IF( Inactive__c , "(This Benefit is presently not active)" & BR(),"")
CustomField.label: Applicable for
